results.generated_script: "This Bears at Lions matchup projects as a high-scoring affair with 47.5 combined points expected. Bears pass-catchers become particularly appealing due to expected volume increases, though running backs should be avoided due to likely game script abandonment. If you're looking for a contrarian play, consider stacking Lions receivers for their touchdown potential in this shootout."
